mapper.select: select reply_no, reply_content, member_Name, reply_date from reply where movie_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_no, reply_content, reply_date, movie_no, member_id, member_Name) values(reply_no_seq.nextval, #{replyContent}, sysdate, #{movieNo}, #{memberId}, #{memberName})
mapper.update: update reply set reply_up = reply_up+1 where reply_no = #{value}
update reply set reply_down = reply_down+1 where reply_no = #{value}
mapper.delete: delete from reply where reply_no = #{replyNo} and member_id= #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into reportReply(member_id, reply_no, count) values(#{memberId}, #{replyNo}, 1)
mapper.select: select sum(count) as count from reportReply where reply_no = #{value}
select member_id, reply_no, count from reportReply where reply_no=#{replyNo} and member_id=#{memberId}
